transcript.text: in hindsight anything onic and I could
have both physically and spiritually
cleaned out this friend of ours but with
the frustration of no money my rising
bitterness with no one at the messianic
congregation helping us out and the
despairing thought that somehow yah was
punishing me for some unexplained reason
I have roughly made the decision to get
our family out of that house a few days
later this proved to be a terrible
choice forced to use credit cards we
found an apartment in portland and i
decided trying to start my own business
would be too difficult so during that
long hot summer i counted the pavement
attempting to look for a job the more I
looked the more doors shut in my face
Portland was already going through a
sluggish downturn and as one month slid
into another with no job our credit card
bill started to mount I finally managed
to land a part-time job selling
greenhouses which was about as easy as
selling ice to an Eskimo after only a
few weeks the job a little money to show
for it I desperately wanted to just get
out of pork maybe we could go back to
our friends in Arkansas we had met some
people at Passover who lived in Texas I
was born and raised in Texas so we could
go back there somewhere anywhere but
this place in desperation I told Annika
one evening we have to get out of here
we're just sliding further into debt I
can't find a decent job this place is no
good where should we go I don't know
maybe back to Texas or Arkansas
someplace we can find support maybe a
good job as we packed up an old trailer
be purchased on yet another credit card
I realized that like Peter I'd allowed
my eyes to drift off Messiah and become
consumed with the wind and waves around
me
fear and frustration at my circumstances
prevented me from simply trusting in yah
as I had done when he had a first set us
out on this trip on the last day of
august 2003 trailer packed with all of
our things no clear destination of mine
we left Portland but God's mighty hand
was still upon us it would not be
Arkansas or Texas that he would bring us
in an amazing display of compassion yah
would soon bring us to one of the most
blessed times of our entire lives
because despite our failures his love
never fails
